data.title: Peoples Bank
data.meta_description: One of America's Best Banks 2024 by Newsweek, with 130 branches in Ohio, West Virginia, Kentucky, Virginia, Washington, D.C. and Maryland.
data.text:
Peoples Bank is the bank of choice for healthcare providers.

Explore our range of solutions for your unique needs, including office expansion, equipment financing, merchant processing and so much more.

Offer ending soon!

Take advantage of this limited-time offer! With Peoples Bank, you can enjoy peace of mind with our fixed, secure rates.

9 Month CD Special

4.89% APY*

Online Banking

Get access to all of your accounts when you enroll in online banking or download the Peoples Bank app.

Lending Solutions

Finance a new home, purchase a new car or consolidate debt with a mortgage, loan or line of credit.

Checking

Each account is designed with benefits

to meet your financial goals.

Find a Career

At Peoples Bank, we create a first-class work experience with exceptional corporate culture.

Make a Payment

Pay your personal, auto, mortgage, recreational vehicle loan or HELOC using our online portal.

Privacy Policy

Security is a top priority for the Peoples family of companies. Privacy Policy last updated May 31, 2024.

Commitment to Community

We continually strive to make a meaningful difference in the neighborhoods where we work and live.

Media Center

Follow our big announcements â€“ from awards to what we are doing in the company and in our communities.

Investor Relations

Providing you the latest news, quarterly financial results and other resources so you can stay informed.

See what solutions work for your business.

Peoples Bank offers big bank capabilities with localized and personal service, offering a suite of products, such as loans, treasury management and employee benefits.

We are taking you to a partner site.

By clicking Continue, you will be taken to a website that is not affiliated with Peoples Bank. Please be advised that you will no longer be subject to, or under the protection of, the privacy and security policies of Peoples Bank's website. We encourage you to read and evaluate the privacy and security policies of the site you are entering, which may be different than those of Peoples Bank.
